content: this pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 cilantro dishcloth is a quick and practical modern kitchen decor piece it combines three stitch patterns which are great for knitting beginners to practice stitches and seasoned knitters looking for an easy relaxing project cilantro is worked in two sections - a seed stitch border with narrow stockinette stitch as a neat separator and a hurdle stitch main area it makes a perfect duo with the cilantro tea towel 2 especially for quick gift knitting this pattern has been tech edited and test knit **sizes** one size - width 18 cm 7 length 18 cm 7 **materials** **yarn ** 40 m 44 yds of 24/7 cotton lion brand yarns - 100% cotton 170 m 186 yds per 100g or similar worsted weight category 4 - medium yarn sample worked in colorway amber **needles ** 5 mm us 8 straight or circular needles or to fit gauge **other ** tapestry needle **gauge** 20 stitches x 25 row in 10x10 cm 4x4 in seed stitch blocked 1 https //whileberry com/blog/cilantro-dishcloth-free-knitting-pattern 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cilantro-tea-towel
